entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Why did you sideline Dr. Fauci during a pandemic, why do you continue to spread false information about the coronavirus. The coronavirus 👉🏼death toll increases 👈🏼as hospitals in hotspots are overwhelmed. Why have you not addressed the Russian bounties on US Troops.
